content.rendered:
School Books & Resources!

The school year is upon us! We still have several assigned-reading titles in stock at Gottwals, and we can order any we have sold out. We also have great resources to help your student excel in class.

Opening Soon – New Orleans Walls of Books!

These pallets of books (not bananas) are headed to the New Orleans Walls of Books! The store is scheduled to open 8/8. We will post images of the completed bookstore soon.

Toy of the Week

See & Spell Learning Puzzle: $19.97

Complete a puzzle to spell a word! This wooden puzzle set helps children gain familiarity with the letters of the alphabet as they develop a sight-reading vocabulary. The letters are also wonderful for stenciling and lots of learning games. Over 60 colorful wooden letters fit into the eight cutout boards to spell three- and four-letter words. All this spelling and fine motor fun fits into one compact wooden storage case!
